title: 24 X 20inch X-Large Reusable Silicone Table Mat Child Kids Dinner Placemat Desk Countertop Waterproof Protector Heat Insulation Kitchen Pastry Rolling Dough Pad Tool (Blue)
features: X-LARGE NO CHEMICAL ODORS SILICONE MAT: Size 24 X 20inch；weight 258g. 100% Food grade silicone, wipes clean easily, waterproof and heat insulation. As a child or adult table mat at home, school or restaurant, it’s very safety and environment friendly
NON STICK SURFACE: Our mats are great for working with sticky materials. As a pastry mat, it is much easy to roll out the dough, pie, pizza crust,bread,homemade biscuits and cookie dough

NON SLID: Lays perfectly flat on countertop, desk or any other surface and won’t curl around the edges. It always keep stable on the table. No need to worry the mat will move when rolling, eating or writing. The thickness is fine as it rolls up without any wrinkles
MULTI FUNCTION MAT: The mat is totally smooth. It can be used as a keyboard pad, table mat, pastry mat, writing drawing mat, game mat etc

EASY TO CLEAN AND STORE: Simply wash silicone mat with warm soapy water or place in the dishwasher to clean. Rolled up or folded, stores away nicely without taking up hardly any space. Protect your countertop or desk table and make cleanup a breeze
description: Why you need a silicone mat?

-Our pastry mat lays perfectly flat on countertop, sheet and other surfaces. Does not move as you roll out the dough. By using it, you will never need to pull out a big, heavy wooden board and a sheet of rubber when you make tortillas, biscuits, pastries. It is more lightweight and convient
-It also can be a table mat, dining mat, countertop protection, keyboard mat, pastry mat, kids snacks mat or fruit mat etc.
-Home, shool, nursery, travel, restaurant, office, lounge room, etc.
-100% food grade silicone. No chemical smell.
Item Weight: 285g Package Included: 1 x Silicone Mat Resists temperatures：from -76°F to 392°F Item Size: Length 24 inch, width20 inch
